body_html:
Ok I solved it.

I added this two lines and modified problematic one:

RUN ln -s /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/libcuda.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/libcuda.so.1
RUN LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH python3 setup.py install 
RUN rm /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs/libcuda.so.1

and that solved the issue. I guess tensorflow changed from implicit libcuda.so to explicit libcuda.so.1 dependency, but I tried without explicit LD_LIBRARY_PATH and it fails. I guess that's needed.
